Gordon said that since the ocr review six weeks ago, the global credit crisis had continued to unfold at an astonishing pace. the past month has seen heavy falls in commodity prices, new lows in world equity markets and the near-failure of citigroup, which was the world's largest bank by market capitalisation as recently as last year. the g7 group of leading industrial powers are simultaneously contracting for the first time since 1982, and while asia and australia would continue to grow it would be at a much slower pace than in recent years. the
